body:
Comment 7: 
my installed SDL library is 32-bit, so i tried building with GOARCH=386, but the build
failed
(/Users/rog/other/go/pkg/darwin_386/stdio.a(align.cgo2.o): malformed mach-o file:
invalid relocation: __jump_table) which is another issue.

i'll see if i can get SDL installed 64 bit (but that'll probably muck up something else).
it would be nice to be able to have both 8g and 6g working at the same time
without duplicating $GOROOT.
